name: Touched By A Spectre
description:
A death metal inspired ShootEmUp BulletHell where a young boy is trying to reunite his favourite band from a very Metal Hell. 

Featuring music made by: 

Ancile Band 
https://www.facebook.com/ancileband
https://www.instagram.com/ancileband/

and After Earth 
https://www.facebook.com/AfterEarthSWE/
https://www.instagram.com/afterearth_swe/
